unitControlModule.stateFactories.actions.executableActions

Interface SmartlyMovingPerformer

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    PlayerUnit, PlayerUnitTerran_Firebat, PlayerUnitTerran_Goliath, PlayerUnitTerran_Marine, PlayerUnitTerran_Medic, PlayerUnitTerran_ScienceVessel, PlayerUnitTerran_SCV, PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank, PlayerUnitTerran_SiegeTank_SiegeMode, PlayerUnitTerran_Vulture, PlayerUnitTerran_Wraith, PlayerUnitTypeFlying, PlayerUnitTypeMelee, PlayerUnitTypeRanged, PlayerUnitWorker

    public interface SmartlyMovingPerformer
    SmartlyMovingPerformer.java --- Interface used for Units capable of moving smartly between ChokePoints towards a certain target.
    Author:
    P H - 13.04.2018

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Instance Methods Abstract Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      bwta.Chokepoint getLastChokePoint()
      Function for retrieving the last ChokePoint the smartly moving Unit has to move to.
      boolean hasReachedLastChokePoint()
      Function for retrieving the value of the flag indicating if the Unit has reached the last ChokePoint that it has to move to.
      boolean isAlreadySmartlyMoving()
      Function for retrieving the information if the performing Unit is already smartly moving and therefore does not need to generate a new List of traversable ChokePoints.
      void resetSmartlyMovingValues()
      Function for resetting all values associated with the smartly moving between ChokePoints (I.e. flags, ChokePoints, ...).
      void setLastChokePoint(bwta.Chokepoint chokePoint)
      Function for setting the last ChokePoint the Unit has to move to.
      void setReachedLastChokePoint(boolean value)
      Function for setting the flag indicating if the Unit has already reached the last ChokePoint.

    • Method Detail

      • isAlreadySmartlyMoving

        boolean isAlreadySmartlyMoving()
        Function for retrieving the information if the performing Unit is already smartly moving and therefore does not need to generate a new List of traversable ChokePoints.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit is already smartly moving and was issued to move from ChokePoint to ChokePoint, otherwise false.

      • getLastChokePoint

        bwta.Chokepoint getLastChokePoint()
        Function for retrieving the last ChokePoint the smartly moving Unit has to move to.
        Returns:
        the last ChokePoint the Unit has to move to or null, if the Unit has none.

      • setLastChokePoint

        void setLastChokePoint(bwta.Chokepoint chokePoint)
        Function for setting the last ChokePoint the Unit has to move to.
        Parameters:
        chokePoint - the last ChokePoint the Unit has to move to.

      • setReachedLastChokePoint

        void setReachedLastChokePoint(boolean value)
        Function for setting the flag indicating if the Unit has already reached the last ChokePoint.
        Parameters:
        value - the value of the flag that is being set.

      • hasReachedLastChokePoint

        boolean hasReachedLastChokePoint()
        Function for retrieving the value of the flag indicating if the Unit has reached the last ChokePoint that it has to move to.
        Returns:
        true if the Unit has reached the last ChokePoint, otherwise false.

      • resetSmartlyMovingValues

        void resetSmartlyMovingValues()
        Function for resetting all values associated with the smartly moving between ChokePoints (I.e. flags, ChokePoints, ...).
